name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Attack
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerable web application to remotely execute malicious scripts on the server. The workflow includes steps for terminating unauthorized sessions, blocking malicious IPs, scanning for threats, and enhancing firewall rules.

action--7152dfe3-bba7-4736-8a7e-9b02f3c7.name: Identify and Terminate Unauthorized PowerShell Sessions
action--7152dfe3-bba7-4736-8a7e-9b02f3c7.description: Terminate any PowerShell sessions that are identified as unauthorized.

action--5e8ef3a2-d6eb-4d08-b8f5-cb8ebd7b.name: Block Outbound Traffic to Known Malicious IPs
action--5e8ef3a2-d6eb-4d08-b8f5-cb8ebd7b.description: Block all network traffic to known malicious IPs.

loop--9f93a72b-8d55-444e-b03e-fd150c9b94.name: Perform Full Scan Until All Threats are Removed
loop--9f93a72b-8d55-444e-b03e-fd150c9b94.description: Repeat the scan process until no threats are detected.

action--48b7225d-3436-4f83-b260-8ea76a72.name: Remove All Secondary Payloads from the System
action--48b7225d-3436-4f83-b260-8ea76a72.description: Delete any detected secondary payloads from the system.

action--c8a5d964-95ba-4f0b-8a25-f061e8ce.name: Enhance Firewall Rules for Script-Based Attacks
action--c8a5d964-95ba-4f0b-8a25-f061e8ce.description: Update firewall rules to prevent script execution attacks.
